"Ice-Cream Rainbow" - A new type of ice cream that is dyed with different colors and flavored with various fruits, creating a colorful and delicious rainbow effect when scooped.
"Chill Out" - A line of ice cream that is infused with various herbs and spices to create a relaxing and calming effect.
"Ice-Cream Truck" - A mobile ice cream truck that travels to different locations and serves upic andic ice cream in a variety of flavors.
"Ice-Cream Sandwich" - A new type of ice cream sandwich that is made with two layers of soft and fluffy ice cream, and a crunchy and sweet cookie in between.
"Ice-Cream Waffle" - A waffle maker that is specifically designed for making ice cream waffles, with aicicicicicic waffle batter and a variety of ice cream toppings to choose from.
